title: Next Steps
subtitle: These steps are just as important, but can be completed at your leisure.

fields.name: symptoms
fields.label: Log symptoms during or after the crash.

fields.name: checklist.notifyInsurance
fields.label: Notify your insurance company of the accident. Email them your completed Crash Assist report.

fields.name: checklist.seekMedicalAttention
fields.label: Seek medical attention. Even if you think you're not injured, get checked out as injuries may not be obvious.

fields.name: checklist.consultAttorney
fields.label: Consult with an attorney, even if you think you don't need one. An attorney will advocate on your behalf with the insurance companies.
